ABOUT US

We Make More Time For Your Favorite Activities

0123456789001234567890                     +
Certified Cleaners
At Qleen, we believe a clean space is more than just appearance, it’s about comfort, clarity, and care. Founded with a mission to bring a higher standard of cleaning to homes, Qleen combines expert service with a personal touch.

Our team is made up of trained professionals who take pride in what they do. We pay attention to the small details that others overlook, using safe, eco-friendly products and proven techniques to ensure your space isn’t just clean, but Qleen.

Whether you need regular house cleaning, detailed office upkeep, or a one-time deep clean, we tailor our services to meet your specific needs. We know that inviting someone into your home or workplace is personal, so we go the extra mile to earn your trust.
With Qleen, it’s not just about cleaning. It’s about delivering peace of mind – one sparkling room at a time.

Fast & Reliable

On-time, every time because your time matters. Excellent performance, flat rates, no surprises. Five star rating on Google from our trusted clients.

Safe & Eco-Friendly

From eco-friendly products to flexible scheduling and responsive customer care, we’re here to make your life easier—and your space fresher.

Trusted Team

Carefully vetted, trained, and insured professional cleaners. Trust is our paramount value. All of our employees go through work authorization check.

From routine home cleanings to deep office cleans and move-in/move-out services, we tailor every job to your needs.

why choose us

What Makes Us Different

Safety First

We're insured and bonded so you're always safe! Insurance covers up to $1M. At Qleen safety comes first.

Trusted Cleaners

Trust is our paramount value. All of our employees go through work authorization check.

Satisfaction Guarantee

If you're not happy, contact us within 24 hours and we'll come back and fix it. Still not happy? We'll refund you completely.

Fair Prices

From a light refresh to a deep clean, we tailor every service to your needs and budget. You’ll never pay for more than you need.

Customer Care

You can reach us by phone, through contact form or via social media almost anytime and get a response super fast.
